resources.string: This app uses the accessibility service to simulate the manual gestures to power off the phone. \nThe accessibility service is required in order to be able to call the power dialog and then simulate the gestures to turn off the phone.
This button will open this tab
This button will reset the position of the draggable items to the center of the screen
This button will call the power dialog so that it is possible to check which action should be performed

On the Settings tab it is possible to select the type of gestures required to turn off the phone. After selecting the type of gesture (one click, two clicks or a swipe) the user has to drag the draggable circles where the click(s) should be simulated. In case two clicks are selected the app will simulate first the click of circle one and then the click of circle two, with a delay of 3 seconds between. In case the swipe is selected, the app will simulate a swipe from point one to point two.
